message.body: I appreciate your understanding of late responses. So after yet another week, how are things for you?
Endured. And even not without its joys. How was your week? Did you have a snow day yesterday?
Mine was tolerable to say the least. No snow day at NYU... I'm convinced we wouldn't stop if the rapture started and plagues ran rampant. Did you get a day off?

Hahaha. Ever unflinching before the edge of doom. Everything was cancelled for me. Both Fordham and the high school where I work sometimes like to immediately cease all operations at the first sign of snow. Any new or exciting film projects this weekend?

What I wouldn't do for a break like that. I've got a festival tonight then I start right back up on a new set Saturday morning. Not that I'm complaining, I love what I do, but I'm 87% certain there might be a world outside of film I'm missing.
Aaaaaaha. The old 13% uncertainty that there is no world outside art...
Is that such a common thing?
Perhaps not the 13% bit (though that seems a fair estimate)
Well I'd question your appreciation for the arts, but I know you've been to the Met at least once and that must count for something.
Oh my...I've probably given you the wrong idea.
To return (if you will) to reality, are you ever free on weekends?
I'm free most weekend usually... Sundays are typically my day off but these past couple of weeks have been odd.
